scripts.update-ip: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const os=require('os');const nets=os.networkInterfaces();const ip=Object.values(nets).flat().find(n=>n.family==='IPv4'&&!n.internal&&n.address.startsWith('192.168.')).address;const config=fs.readFileSync('src/config/development.local.ts','utf8');const updated=config.replace(/http:\/\/[\d.]+:/,'http://'+ip+':');fs.writeFileSync('src/config/development.local.ts',updated);console.log('Updated IP to:',ip);"
